name: Ian Eisele
title: Application Scientist
bio: I'm an Application Scientist with a passion for leveraging technology to solve complex scientific challenges. My expertise spans CDS software, Python development, and machine learning applications in scientific contexts.

With a strong foundation in scientific data analysis, I bridge the gap between domain expertise and software solutions. I enjoy building tools and systems that help scientists and researchers work more efficiently.
When I'm not coding or analyzing data, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or diving into the latest research in AI and machine learning.
